info.title: DNS/Email Security Tool API
info.description: Use the Authorize button at the top to input your Bearer token for protected endpoints. Account for test: jack.nguyen, password: Xr9$e2@LmVq#74Wd

bearerAuth.description: Enter your JWT token obtained from the login endpoint

message.example: Registration successful! Please check your email to verify your account.
If an account with this email exists, a password reset link has been sent.
Email verified successfully! You can now log in.

spf_record.description: Optional SPF record to analyze (if not provided, will fetch from DNS)

post.description: Register a new user account. Email verification will be sent.
Authenticate user and return JWT token

get.description: Verify user email address using verification token

post.description: Send password reset email to user
Reset user password using reset token

delete.description: Delete a domain from user's list

get.description: Get DNS records for a domain

parameters.name: record_type
parameters.description: DNS record type (A, AAAA, MX, TXT, CNAME, NS, SOA)

get.description: Get all DNS record types for a domain
Analyze specific DNS record types or run comprehensive analysis for a domain using the dns_individual.py script

parameters.name: record_type
parameters.description: DNS record type to analyze. If not provided, runs comprehensive analysis of all record types

use_cases.description: Analysis results for each record type

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of analyses to return
